comments:
Created an attachment (id=77358)
The ant file to reproduce the error

Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Starting eclipse
2. Opening Ant editor on build.xml (attached) --> works!
3. (Un)commenting some lines in section "<macrodef name="properties">" of the file until
4. Syntax highlighting of comments and non comments is intermingled (which is an error in itself)
5. Closing the Ant editor
6. Try and reopen the Ant editor. This fails saying: "Error opening the editor." And looking at the "Details" shows the following exception:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration cannot be cast to org.apache.xerces.xni.parser.XMLParserConfiguration

7. After restarting eclipse the editor can be opened again and you can replay this bug scenario from step one...


More information:
...ask me

Thank you for the bug report.
